thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com | 2 of 72
thread.title: Larry E
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Larry E

author: Larry E
title: Larry E
text:
Overall very professional service. Only time will tell if the combo systerm does all that is advertised zero chlorine for sure and that's good.
This is a typical sales/service company, once the salesman sets you up and closes the contract, it's hard to communicate with that person again. It's now in the hands of service if you need any help. The only issues I had was with the plumbing during install but all was corrected by them.
I would recommend getting your own plumber as I was charged double what the cost would have been with a private contractor.
